statements: SELECT * FROM product_movement;
SELECT product_name, current_stage FROM product_movement WHERE product_id = 123;
SELECT product_name, current_stage FROM product_movement ORDER BY current_stage ASC;
SELECT * FROM product_movement WHERE current_stage = 'In Progress';
SELECT product_name, previous_stage FROM product_movement WHERE previous_stage IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM product_movement
SELECT product_name, current_stage FROM product_movement WHERE current_stage = 'In Progress'
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM product_movement WHERE product_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY product_id DESC
SELECT DISTINCT current_stage FROM product_movement ORDER BY current_stage ASC
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stage, previous_stage FROM product_movement WHERE current_stage = 'Completed' OR previous_stage = 'In Progress'
SELECT * FROM product_movement;
SELECT stage, movement_date FROM product_movement ORDER BY movement_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, stage_to FROM supply_chain WHERE vendor_id = 100;
SELECT DISTINCT stage_from, stage_to FROM supply_chain WHERE product_id = 500 ORDER BY movement_date ASC;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS num_movements FROM supply_chain GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM product_movement WHERE stage = 'In Transit';
SELECT product_id, stage, movement_date FROM product_movement ORDER BY movement_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, stage, movement_date FROM product_movement WHERE stage = 'Received' OR stage = 'Shipped';
SELECT product_id, stage_from, stage_to, movement_date FROM supply_chain WHERE vendor_id = 101 ORDER BY movement_date ASC;
SELECT product_id, vendor_id, supplier_id, stage_from, stage_to, movement_date FROM supply_chain WHERE supplier_id = 201;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_name, stage FROM products WHERE stage = 'In Progress';
SELECT product_name, quantity, stage FROM products ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM product_movements WHERE move_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE stage='Production';
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, move_date FROM products JOIN product_movements ON products.product_id = product_movements.product_id;
SELECT products.product_name, stages.stage_name FROM products JOIN stages ON products.stage = stages.stage_name;
SELECT product_id, product_name, move_date FROM products JOIN product_movements ON products.product_id = product_movements.product_id WHERE move_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_location DESC;
SELECT product_name, stage FROM products WHERE stage = 'Production' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT movement_id, product_id, source_stage_id, destination_stage_id FROM movements WHERE movement_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT product_name, supplier_name FROM products p INNER JOIN suppliers s ON p.supplier_id = s.supplier_id;
SELECT product_name, stage_name FROM products p INNER JOIN stages s ON p.stage = s.stage_name;
SELECT product_name, supplier_name, supplier_location FROM products p JOIN suppliers s ON p.supplier_id = s.supplier_id;
SELECT p.product_name, s.supplier_name, m.movement_date FROM products p JOIN suppliers s ON p.supplier_id = s.supplier_id JOIN movements m ON p.product_id = m.product_id;
SELECT * FROM product_stage;
SELECT product_name FROM product_stage WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stage FROM product_stage ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, current_stage FROM product_stage WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT product_id, current_stage FROM product_stage WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM product_stage;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM product_stage WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, current_stage FROM product_stage ORDER BY current_stage DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stage FROM product_stage WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%';

SELECT stage_history.history_id, stage_history.product_id, product_name, stage, entry_date FROM stage_history JOIN product_stage ON stage_history.product_id = product_stage.product_id ORDER BY entry_date ASC;
